name: Siddartha Gurugubelli
title: Software Developer
bio: Fueled by curiosity and a love for engineering, I specialize in building scalable, end-to-end software—from robust backend systems to responsive user interfaces—leveraging modern web frameworks, cloud platforms, and AI/ML technologies.
about:
I’m a dedicated Software Engineer with a passion for building intuitive and impactful products. With full-stack experience across both frontend and backend technologies, I’ve worked on everything from building scalable APIs to designing responsive UIs and deploying production-ready applications in the cloud.

My expertise spans modern web frameworks, AWS services, and scalable architectures, along with a solid foundation in AI/ML—especially in Generative AI, NLP, and Computer Vision. I enjoy solving complex problems by writing clean, testable code and optimizing systems for performance and reliability.

I’m always exploring emerging technologies and engineering best practices, driven by a constant desire to learn and improve. My goal is simple: to build software that’s not only functional and efficient, but also meaningful and user-focused.
